rooms.description: A welcoming space that adheres to Vastu principles with a north-east facing entrance.
An open-plan area that seamlessly merges living and dining spaces with eco-friendly natural light.
Open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area, featuring energy-efficient appliances and sustainable materials.
A spacious bedroom oriented towards a calm direction to encourage restful sleep.
A comfortable guest room that follows eco-friendly design principles and Vastu guidelines.
A functional bathroom located conveniently near the bedrooms with water-saving fixtures.

openings.description: Large windows to maximize natural light and ventilation.
